00029 DataGroupReader::DataGroupReader(std::ifstream& is, DataGroupHeader& hdr)
00030 : fileStream(is), dataGroupHdr(hdr)
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00034 DataGroupReader::~DataGroupReader()
00035 {
00036 }

00038 /*
00039  * Get the number of DataSets in the DataGroup
00040  */
00041 int32_t DataGroupReader::GetDataSetCnt() const
00042 {
00043         return dataGroupHdr.GetDataSetCnt();
00044 }
00045 
00046 /*
00047  * Get the name of the DataGroup
00048  */
00049 std::wstring DataGroupReader::GetDataGroupName() const
00050 {
00051         return dataGroupHdr.GetName();
00052 }
00053 
00054 /*
00055  * Get the DataSetReader by index
00056  */
00057 DataSetReader DataGroupReader::GetDataSetReader(int32_t index)
00058 {
00059         if (index < 0 || index > dataGroupHdr.GetDataSetCnt())
00060         {
00061                 DataSetNotFoundException e;
00062                 throw e;
00063         }
00064 
00065         DataSetHeader& dph = dataGroupHdr.GetDataSet(index);
00066         DataSetReader dpReader(fileStream, dph);
00067         return dpReader;
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * Get the DataSetReader by name
00072  */
00073 DataSetReader DataGroupReader::GetDataSetReader(const std::wstring& name)
00074 {
00075         DataSetHeader* dph = dataGroupHdr.FindDataSetHeader(name);
00076         if (dph == 0)
00077         {
00078                 DataSetNotFoundException e;
00079                 throw e;
00080         }
00081 
00082         DataSetReader dpReader(fileStream, *dph);
00083         return dpReader;
00084 }
